Indian Economy.title: Cause and defect: Economic embers had a major role in Nepal’s eruption
Indian Economy.summary: This week’s turmoil in Nepal may have been sparked off by its ban on social media, but the frustration of the country’s youth has a deeper economic cause—notably, jobless growth. It’s a challenge Nepal doesn’t face alone.

Indian Economy.title: Is inflation in India headed for a ‘new normal’ that’s lower?
Indian Economy.summary: Attribute India’s recent decline in inflation to both cyclical and structural factors. How sustainable they are must be checked, but signs exist of the economy on its way to an equilibrium of better price stability. RBI might have more policy space already.

Indian Economy.title: When Gen Z protests, the revolution is hashtag-ed, meme-d, and reel-ed
Indian Economy.summary: Nepal Gen Z protests: From memes and hashtags to viral TikTok dances and Snapchat videos, Nepal's Gen Z did what Gen Z does best to amplify their voices against corruption and social injustice.

Indian Economy.title: India must invest in agri-tech and soil health to build climate-resilient food systems, say experts
Indian Economy.summary: India's agricultural sector, contributing 18.2% to GDP, faces challenges from climate change, unsustainable practices, and policy issues. Experts urge for improved investment in research, technology, and sustainable practices to enhance soil health and food s…

Indian Economy.title: GST 2.0 will boost growth
Indian Economy.summary: The reforms are both citizen- and business-friendly

Startups & Funding.title: Databricks AI Chief to Exit, Launch a New Computer Startup
Startups & Funding.summary: Naveen Rao, the head of artificial intelligence at the $100 billion startup Databricks Inc., is planning to leave his position to launch a new venture making a novel type of computer, according to a person familiar with the matter.

Startups & Funding.title: Gautam Thakar steps down as CEO of Prosus’ global edtech practice
Startups & Funding.summary: Gautam Thakar, who took up the role in August 2023, was instrumental in guiding edtech investments of Prosus in India through a downturn marked by significant corrections in valuations and pivots in business models.

Startups & Funding.title: From Zerodha to Zepto: Ask Private Wealth and Hurun India release ‘Unicorn Report 2025’ list — check who made to top 20
Startups & Funding.summary: ASK Private Wealth and Hurun India's ‘Unicorn and Future Unicorn Report 2025’ ranks India's start-ups, identifying 73 unicorns and 150 future unicorns; besides highlighting growth across sectors which showcase India's entrepreneurial spirit.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI buys 4.2-acre land parcel from MMRCL for Rs 3,472 crore in Mumbai’s Nariman Point
Banking & Finance.summary: For MMRCL, the revenue from the land sale to RBI is expected to be directed towards funding the Metro Line 3 works and repaying loans, including those from JICA.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI plans to give lenders key power to recover small loans, sources say
Banking & Finance.summary: After consultations with lenders, the RBI is expected to update its Fair Practices Code within months, introducing guidelines on phone-locking mechanisms

Banking & Finance.title: RBI in the process of further simplifying access to economic data: ED Joshi
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI simplifies data access for economic analysis, benefiting analysts, researchers, and students, with a focus on policy-making.

Banking & Finance.title: Rupee closes at all-time low of 88.44/USD
Banking & Finance.summary: Rupee hits all-time low against dollar due to import demand, US tariffs, and RBI's non-intervention, with near-term outlook uncertain.

Technology Sector.summary: Arshdeep Singh, who is one strike away from becoming the first Indian to take 100 T20I wickets, was left out of the Indian squad that shredded UAE to pieces in their first match of the 2025 Asia Cup.

Technology Sector.title: Ahead of Diwali, Railways approves extension of 18 Bihar-bound trains – Full list
Technology Sector.summary: Trains to Bihar: Ahead of the upcoming festive season, Indian Railways (IR) has approved the extension of 18 Bihar-bound trains. The move is aimed at improving connectivity and providing greater travel convenience for passengers.

Technology Sector.title: India may be the favourite to win Asia Cup but Suryakumar Yadav’s team will be tested
